name: Becca Lyria
alt: Banner art of Becca.
description: She uses this portrait to advertise her services.

name: A Forest Adventure
alt: Becca with one eye closed, pushing through some trees in a forest, wearing a purple corset and pants.
description: Becca loves exploring. You never know when you might find an ancient ruin.

name: A Day at the Beach
alt: Becca in a purple bikini, sunbathing on the beach.
description: Becca takes a rare moment to relax.

name: Princess Becca
alt: Becca in a regal ballgown and tiara, her hair in a bun.
description: She may not actually be royalty, but the crown definitely suits her.

name: Sketch
alt: A quick sketch of Becca with an inquisitive look on her face.
description: Rosalia had this sketch done for Becca at a faire they had attended.

name: Chilling at the Park
alt: Becca wearing a black corset with a mesh shawl and purple shorts, sitting on a ledge.
description: A moment of respite, before the journey continues.

name: A Wink and a Kiss
alt: Becca winking, lifting one of her pigtails up in her hand.
description: Sometimes she can't help but flirt, even if it's just a mild wink.

name: Ready to Fight
alt: Becca with one hand raised, ready to fight.
description: Becca is always ready to take on the next challenger and show off her magical prowess.

name: Vitriol
alt: Becca with her arms crossed, giving an annoyed look.
description: It takes a lot to get under Becca's skin, but when she's finally angry you had best watch out.

name: Another Day
alt: Becca wearing her typical attire.
description: Just another day of magic and adventuring.

name: Dressed Up for Summer
alt: Becca wearing a purple spaghetti strap dress with a wide ruffled skirt.
description: When the weather gets warmer, Becca has to change her wardrobe to match.

name: Shy Elegance
alt: Becca in a tight fitted strapless dress with a white top and purple skirt.
description: A rare moment where Becca was actually feeling shy.

name: Young Becca
alt: Becca as a young teen, still wearing her typical attire.
description: Even when she was younger, Becca always enjoyed adventuring and studying.

name: Sassy Queen
alt: Becca in a purple plunging neckline dress, smoking a cigar.
description: Becca is both powerful and elegant at the same time.

name: The Royal Ball
alt: Becca in a tight fitted strapless dress with a white top and purple skirt, smoking a cigarette.
description: She had the chance to attend a royal ball, and she made sure to make an impression.

name: Feeling Flirty
alt: Becca in a purple dress, on her knees with a flirtatious look.
description: Wonder what she has in mind...

name: Playful
alt: Becca in her typical dress, with a playful smile on her face.
description: She takes joy in her adventures, and sees the challenges as nothing more than a game.

name: Shining Beauty
alt: Becca in her typically attire, smiling with bubbles behind her.
description: While she knows she looks good, Becca rarely takes a moment to admire herself.

name: A Night on the Town
alt: Becca in a fancy evening dress with a black bow sash and purple gloves. Her hair is up in a ponytail.
description: She's all ready for a night out - gonna paint the town red.

name: White Mocha With Extra Becca
alt: Becca in a starbucks cup labelled White Mocha with Raspberry
description: Not your typical Starbucks order...

name: Token
alt: Becca as a character token for Dungeons and Dragons
description: When she doesn't have an adventure to go on, Becca plays TTRPGS to pass the time.

name: Wink
alt: Becca winking and making a peace sign with her fingers.
description: She was feeling victorious after yet another successful adventure.
